articles.author: Adela Suliman
articles.title: Birds are using anti-bird spikes to fortify nests in 'perfect comeback' - The Washington Post
articles.description: Research in Europe shows birds are protecting their nests with spikes installed on buildings to prevent them from perching.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
Comment
LONDON Look up. The birds are taking charge.
The hard metal spikes that humans install to prevent birds from perching have been found in nests across Europe. The bird… [+4534 chars]
